list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove unused admin logic and update README file
Removed redundant `SingletonAdmin` implementation and associated `ErrorPageAdmin` logic from `admin.py`, as it was no longer in use. Additionally, updated the README with a project introduction and setup instructions.

task.summary:
Update basket page to handle delivery fees and free delivery
Added logic to calculate delivery fees based on store settings and display free delivery qualification on the basket page. Updated the basket template and context data to show final total and delivery details accordingly.

Update .env and project configurations
Updated the `.env` file to revise allowed hosts. Added a new `.idea/djangoProject.iml` file and adjusted IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files to align with the updated development environment.

Add product search functionality and UI improvements
Introduced a new ProductSearchView and related templates to enable product search functionality. Updated URLs, views, and base HTML for search integration. Improved product display layouts with better alignment and responsiveness across templates.

Add Stripe payment integration with user details page
Implemented Stripe payment flow, including a user details page, secure payment redirection, and payment confirmation. Updated templates, views, URLs, and settings to support the integration. Added required dependencies and configurations for Stripe API.

Update Stripe API keys in .env file
Replaced placeholder Stripe keys with test API keys for development purposes. Ensures compatibility with Stripe API during local testing and integration.

Add order email templates and enhance order processing
Introduced customer and admin email templates for order confirmation and notifications. Updated order processing to send transactional emails, manage stock updates, and ensure accurate pricing calculations with delivery fees. Enhanced session handling and improved the user experience.

Remove unused admin logic and update README file
Removed redundant `SingletonAdmin` implementation and associated `ErrorPageAdmin` logic from `admin.py`, as it was no longer in use. Additionally, updated the README with a project introduction and setup instructions.
